DefaultQueueBudgetAction.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: NONE | STOP_SCHEDULING_AND_COMPLETE_TASKS | STOP_SCHEDULING_AND_CANCEL_TASKS  
Update requires: No interruption

S3BucketName.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 3  
Maximum Length: 63  
Pattern: (?!^(\d+\.)+\d+$)(^(([a-z0-9]|[a-z0-9][a-z0-9\-]*[a-z0-9])\.)*([a-z0-9]|[a-z0-9][a-z0-9\-]*[a-z0-9])$)  
Update requires: No interruption

---

PasswordArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 20  
Maximum Length: 2048

Update requires: No interruption
